article_title: Dr. Keith Ablow to host fundraiser for Ben Carson in Newbury
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: Republican presidential contender Dr. Ben Carson will visit Newbury next week.Dr. Keith Ablow and his wife, Deborah Small, will host a private, political fundraiser for Carson at their Newburyport home, Thursday, Sept. 24.Tickets will be $2,700 per person for a roundtable discussion from 6:30 p.m. to 7:30 p.m. and $500 for a general reception from 7:30 p.m. to 8:30 p.m.Carson will not be making any public appearance or statements during his visit and press won’t be invited to the
article_metadata.author: Dan Mac Alpine
